story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_01: I see we’re all here. Let’s get started, then!
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_02:
I received some intel that the International Police
have now started their investigation on Pasio.
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_03:
According to their report, Team Rocket isn’t the
only group active on Pasio—Team Galactic is now
on the move, too!
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_05:
They’re a group of baddies from the
Sinnoh region!
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_06:
They said they wanted to create a new world...
But they tried to steal Pokémon and Professor
Rowan’s research!
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_07: They caused all sorts of trouble for us!
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_08: Maybe we should let Cynthia know about this, too.
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_09: Good idea! I’d feel better with her helping us out.
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_10: OK! Just you wait, Team Galactic!
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_11:
You won’t get away with your dirty deeds as long
as I’m around!
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_13: Guess it’s up to us to find Cynthia, then!
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_14: We’ll stay here and protect Professor Bellis!
story_teamgalactic_01_03000/2401_1201_15:
If anything happens, let us know. We can help you
out if things get dicey.
